title: #283: Take This Job And Shove It (@TomSegura)
itunes:title: Take This Job And Shove It with Tom Segura
description: Tom Segura took me up to his hotel room in the East Village of New York and we sat and talked about all the jobs we've had over the years. Pretty much every comic you've ever heard of has had to do lots of different things to make some money over the years. And we've each had a bunch. So it was a fun conversation about our least favorite thing.
